column4: BRIEF-Tesla CEO Elon Musk says in tweet Tesla Semi truck unveil and test ride tentatively scheduled for Oct 26th in Hawthorne
column5: * Tesla CEO Elon Musk says in tweet Tesla Semi truck unveil and test ride tentatively scheduled for Oct 26th in Hawthorne Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom)

column4: Tesla's head of business development leaves after 11 years
column5: SAN FRANCISCO Tesla Inc said on Wednesday that long-time executive Diarmuid O'Connell  vice president of business development  had left after more than a decade at the electric car company.

column4: Tesla's head of business development leaves after 11 years
column5: SAN FRANCISCO  Sept 13 Tesla Inc said on Wednesday that long-time executive Diarmuid O'Connell  vice president of business development  had left after more than a decade at the electric car company.
